com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.combat

Class RealityDisruptorEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.combat.RealityDisruptorEffect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EveryFrameWeaponEffectPlugin, OnFireEffectPlugin, OnHitEffectPlugin

    public class RealityDisruptorEffect
extends java.lang.Object
implements OnFireEffectPlugin, OnHitEffectPlugin, EveryFrameWeaponEffectPlugin
    IMPORTANT: will be multiple instances of this, as this doubles as the every frame effect and the on fire effect (same instance) But also as the visual for each individual shot (created via onFire, using the non-default constructor)
